overview: Angel's not scared of losing, but he would rather play a game he knows he can win. Who knew he could make a game out of fucking his buddy Eugene. Step-cousins Bruno and Sly have been dating off-and-on for a few years. They met at the family reunion and kept in touch afterwards. The sex was always good, as was the friendship. So Bruno would do anything for Sly, including giving him a back rub and more. Oliver's been craving a piece of his roommate, Beno, since they got to school. One day after practice, he decided to make his move which paid off better than either could imagine. Step-brothers, Donnan and Frank love to fool around. They've been this way ever since high school. Now they get together now and then. But last week, Frank invited Donnan over for a massage. How could he say no? Enjoy Anal Twink Lovers today.
title: Anal Twink Lovers
